availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Bavaria. Son of Philip and Elisabeth Ladenburger. Married to Mary P. Birk Ladenburger in Brown, Ohio on April 15, 1862. Father of George C.T., John L., William H., and Sarah E. Ladenburger. Resident of Lancaster County, Pennsylvania in 1860. Resident of Mason County, Kentucky in September 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Pennsylvania, Lancaster, Columbia, p. 51.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, Dover, 308B.
County Marriage Records, Ohio, 1774-1993, Brown County, film #000384276, p. 242 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
